title: Client Crash Issue: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
body:
I have tried both new and old client today and have experience crashes and received the error message above. The thing is my internet connection is perfectly fine and I didn't have any issue browsing websites and doing other stuffs.

The crashes happened post champ selection screen and about to load into the Summoner Rift

replies.body: When you finish champion select and go into the loading screen your network needs to make a new connection with the individual game server. Since you keep getting a message that you were disconnected, let's go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network can keep a stable connection to our servers.
